alerts.description: 苍梧县气象台2024年2月4日6时19分发布暴雨黄色预警信号：受降雨云团影响，过去2小时苍梧县沙头镇已出现30毫米降雨，目前强降雨云团正缓慢东北移，预计未来6小时，苍梧县北部还将有10-20毫米降雨，积涝和地质灾害气象风险大，请防范。
alerts.title: 梧州市气象台发布暴雨黄色预警信号[III级/较重]

alerts.description: 苍梧县气象台于2024年1月1日20时3分发布冰雹橙色预警信号：目前，强对流云团正逐渐靠近苍梧县西部，预计未来2小时，苍梧县岭脚镇、京南镇将可能出现冰雹天气，并伴有雷电或短时大风，请注意防范。
alerts.title: 苍梧县气象台发布冰雹橙色预警信号[II级/严重]

alerts.description: 苍梧县气象台于2023年11月28日5时13分发布大雾橙色预警信号。龙圩区已出现能见度小于200米的浓雾，预计浓雾天气持续，请注意防范。
alerts.title: 苍梧县气象台发布大雾橙色预警信号[II级/严重]

alerts.description: 苍梧县气象台于2023年11月27日7时15分发布大雾黄色预警信号：龙圩区已出现能见度小于500米的雾，预计大雾天气持续，请注意防范。
alerts.title: 苍梧县气象台发布大雾黄色预警信号[III级/较重]

alerts.description: 苍梧县气象台2024年2月21日19时33分发布大风蓝色预警信号：受冷空气影响，预计未来24小时内苍梧县及龙圩区将出现6级以上大风，请注意防范。
alerts.title: 苍梧县气象台发布大风蓝色预警信号[IV级/一般]

alerts.description: 苍梧县气象台于2024年3月25日20时10分发布雷雨大风黄色预警信号：目前强对流云团正逐渐靠近苍梧县，预计未来6小时内苍梧县将出现7-8级阵风，并伴有雷电或短时强降水，请注意防范。
alerts.title: 苍梧县气象台发布雷雨大风黄色预警信号[III级/较重]

alerts.description: The Cangwu County Meteorological Observatory issued a blue warning signal for strong winds at 19:33 on February 21, 2024: Due to the influence of cold air, it is expected that there will be strong winds of level 6 or above in Cangwu County and Longwei District within the next 24 hours. Please take precautions.
alerts.title: Cangwu County Meteorological Observatory issues a blue warning signal for strong winds [Level IV/General]

alerts.description: The Cangwu County Meteorological Observatory issued a yellow warning signal for heavy fog at 5:05 am on March 15, 2024: It is expected that there will be heavy fog with visibility less than 500 meters in Cangwu County and Longwei District within the next 12 hours. Please take precautions.
alerts.title: Cangwu County Meteorological Observatory issues a yellow warning signal for heavy fog [Level III/Heavy]

alerts.description: The Cangwu County Meteorological Observatory issued a yellow warning signal for thunderstorms and strong winds at 20:10 on March 25, 2024. Currently, a strong convective cloud cluster is gradually approaching Cangwu County, and it is expected that there will be 7-8 level gusts in Cangwu County within the next 6 hours, accompanied by lightning or short-term heavy rainfall. Please take precautions.
alerts.title: Cangwu County Meteorological Observatory issues a yellow warning signal for thunderstorms and strong winds [Level III/severe]

alerts.description: The Cangwu County Meteorological Observatory issued an orange hail warning signal at 20:3 on January 1, 2024: Currently, a strong convective cloud cluster is gradually approaching the western part of Cangwu County. It is expected that in the next 2 hours, there may be hail weather in Lingjiao Town and Jingnan Town of Cangwu County, accompanied by lightning or short-term strong winds. Please take precautions.
alerts.title: Cangwu County Meteorological Observatory issues an orange hail warning signal [Level II/Severe]

alerts.description: The Cangwu County Meteorological Observatory issued an orange warning signal for heavy fog at 3:37 am on February 2, 2024: Thick fog with visibility less than 200 meters has appeared in Longwei District, and it is expected that the dense fog weather will continue. Please take precautions.
alerts.title: Cangwu County Meteorological Observatory issues orange warning signal for heavy fog [Level II/severe]

alerts.description: At 6:19 on February 4, 2024, the meteorological station of Cangwu County issued a yellow rainstorm warning signal: Affected by the rain clouds, 30 mm rain has occurred in Shatou Town of Cangwu County in the past two hours. At present, the heavy rain clouds are slowly moving to the northeast. It is estimated that there will be 10-20 mm rain in the north of Cangwu County in the next six hours. The meteorological risk of waterlogging and geological disasters is high, so please take precautions.
alerts.title: Wuzhou Meteorological Station issued a yellow warning signal for rainstorm [Level III/heavy]
